entry.title: Bellevue Upholstered Panel Bed, King
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type: BRH20XK
Price: 899.00

Description

  • Wide rectangle tufted fabric headboard for a classic and timeless feel
  • Padded headboard and bed frame upholstered in soft fabric
  • Durable wooden slats provide added support and eliminate the need for a box spring
  • Two adjustable support legs provide extra stability on uneven surfaces
  • Fits a standard king size mattress
  • Black solid wood accent legs complete the look
  • Shipped to you in 1 box
  • Mattress not included*

Behind every sweet dream is a good bed, and if you’re still looking for the right one, you found it. Supported by solid wood legs and durable wooden slats so there is no need for a box spring. This bed features a low-profile, streamlined design that works well in any contemporary setting. Upholstered in beautiful foam-filled wide rectangle tufted fabric for an inviting and classic feel. Shipped to you in one box with easy assembly you will be drifting off to sleep in no time

entry.title: Fairfield Tufted Leatherette Day Bed with Trundle, Single
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 1184.00

Description

 

  • Upholstered in a soft easy to care for, leatherette material
  • Nailhead trim accents, arched top, and gently sloped arms
  • Tufted backrest for style and comfort
  • Space-saving hidden trundle bed rolls out and tucks away when not in use
  • Durable wood construction with painted black slats provide optimal support and eliminate the need for a box spring
  • The rolling trundle bed is equipped with stoppers to keep your beds attached
  • The top bed accommodates a standard twin/single sized mattress, trundle bed accommodates a standard twin/single mattress with a maximum 5” thickness

Create a cozy and versatile living space with this daybed, wrapped in a soft, easy to clean leatherette. This daybed combines the tufted padded backrest with elegant arch accents and gently sloped arms, creating a style that can elevate the decor of any bedroom. Featuring a hidden trundle design, this daybed creates additional sleeping spots for overnight guests. Bring home this daybed to create a cozy place to lounge or sleep, making it ideal for any den or guest room.

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 39"H X 81"W X 44"D
Product Weight 178 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 20"H X 39"W X 39"D
Carton Shipping Weight 208 lbs.
Materials Engineered wood, Plywood, Leatherette, Foam
Max Weight 198 lbs.
